data.text:

Infor Public Sector Helps City of Rockford Meet Citizen Demands for Online Government Interaction

The city of Rockford Ill. has responded to Mayor Lawrence Morrissey’s request for increased opportunities for citizens to interact with City Hall over the internet with new software that allows citizens and contractors to apply for and check the status of permits at any time. In addition to citizen service, the software will also enable the City of Rockford to process the permits faster and with less human error. - July 17, 2009
